TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit RootDesignerSerializerAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class RootDesignerSerializerAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class RootDesignerSerializerAttribute sealed : Attribute

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("This attribute has been deprecated. Use DesignerSerializerAttribute instead. For example, to specify a root designer for CodeDom, use DesignerSerializerAttribute(...,typeof(TypeCodeDomSerializer)). http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=14202")

summary.span: 指示用于根设计器对象的基序列化程序。

span.span: Indicates the base serializer to use for a root designer object.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指示要在序列化管理器序列化设计文档，以及是否指定序列化程序支持自动重新加载，但未事先设计文档的使用序列化程序完全释放的文档。 indicates the serializer to use when the serialization manager serializes the design document, and whether the specified serializer supports automatic reloading of the design document without first completely disposing of the document. 此属性包含以下重要成员：This attribute contains the following significant members: - 指示要用来将该类在设计时序列化哪些序列化对象。 indicates what serialization object to use to serialize the class at design time. - 指示序列化对象的基类型的完全限定的名称。 indicates the fully qualified name of the serialization object's base type. - 指示是否序列化程序支持重新加载设计文档，而无需用户交互，以打开新的设计器视图。 indicates whether the serializer supports reloading a design document without user interaction to open a new designer view. ## Examples 下面的代码示例适用到组件。The following example code applies a to a component. [!code-cpp[IDesignerSerializationManagerSample#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IDesignerSerializationManagerSample/CPP/idesignerserializationmanagersample.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[IDesignerSerializationManagerSample#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IDesignerSerializationManagerSample/CS/idesignerserializationmanagersample.cs#2)] [!code-vb[IDesignerSerializationManagerSample#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IDesignerSerializationManagerSample/VB/idesignerserializationmanagersample.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public bool Reloadable { get; }
.property instance bool Reloadable
Public ReadOnly Property Reloadable As Boolean
public: property bool Reloadable { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示根序列化程序是否支持在不首先释放设计器宿主的条件下即可重新加载设计文档。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the root serializer supports reloading of the design document without first disposing the designer host.

value.span: 如果根序列化程序支持重新加载，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the root serializer supports reloading; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果此属性设置为`false`，设计文档不自动执行代表用户重新加载。If this property is set to `false`, the design document does not automatically perform a reload on behalf of the user. 如果此属性设置为`false`、 负责用户重新打开设计器视图窗口对于设计文档中，如果更新或重新加载所需。If this property is set to `false`, it is the user's responsibility to reopen the designer view window for the design document, if an update or reload is desired. 部分序列化程序需要设计器加载过程以重建设计文档中的外部组件的交互。Some serializers require the interaction of external components in the designer loading process in order to rebuild the design document. 这些序列化程序有时需要创建新的设计器宿主每次加载设计文档。These serializers sometimes need to create a new designer host each time the design document is loaded. 如果是这样的话，将设置为`false`，必须重新创建设计器宿主和由用户交互 （启动文档的设计器） 设计后释放文档。If this is the situation, will be set to `false`, and the designer host must be recreated by user interaction (launching the designer for the document) after the design document is disposed. 事件和服务已连接到设计器宿主中，除通过反序列化，不会保留，并且可能需要再次设置。The events and services that were connected to the designer host, except through deserialization, do not remain and may need to be set again. 如果是`true`，设计文档可以重新加载设计器外部在更改后的代码，而无需关闭设计器窗口，然后重新打开它。If is `true`, the design document can be reloaded after changes outside the designer are made to the code, without closing the designer window and reopening it.

summary.span: 获取此特性类型的唯一 ID。

span.span: Gets a unique ID for this attribute type.

value.span: 一个包含此特性类型的唯一 ID 的对象。

span.span: An object containing a unique ID for this attribute type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性通过筛选算法用于标识具有相同的类型的两个特性。This property is used by filtering algorithms to identify two attributes that are the same type. 对于大多数属性，这只返回属性的实例。For most attributes, this just returns the instance for the attribute. 重写此特性以包含编辑器基类型的类型。 overrides this to include the type of the editor base type.
